articles.title: Kareena Kapoor Khan’s pic with Malaika Arora, Karisma and others proves ‘Bffs that pout together stay forever’ - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Kareena Kapoor Khan’s girl gang Malaika Arora, Karisma Kapoor, Amrita Arora is known for their signature pout pose. Today, Malaika shared a throwback photo as she missed the good old days of hanging out with her ladies.

articles.title: Watch: Lijo Jose Pellissery’s ‘Churuli’ trailer promises another dark film - The News Minute
articles.description: On the first of July, maverick director Lijo Jose Pellissery has put out the trailer of yet another seemingly dark film he's made, called Churuli. The little more than three minute trailer begins with animated visuals, as the voice of a woman narrates a tale.
articles.content: The trailer comes at a time when the director has been arguing for the freedom of artistes to create content.On the first of July, maverick director Lijo Jose Pellissery has put out the trailer of ye… [+1716 chars]
